info.name: Paradox Wikis | Sceptrum 2023
info.description:
An aesthetic, dark design for Paradox Wikis. 

It's made and finetuned for Stellaris but mostly works with other titles present on the wikis as well. I consider Stellaris is complete on reader side. A few very minor glitches left, which are not worth to bother with or are out of my reach. Unnoticeable. Edit page is still a real mess, I'm going to look into it as my time allows.

EU4 has its own color theme based on the game.

Tested on FHD and 2K. I cannot provide help with 4K.
